author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 15-year-old boy was held on the charges of attempting to sexually assault a 4 year-old-girl here.

The accused, a Standard X student of Government Boys Higher Secondary School here, had allegedly took the girl to an isolated spot while she had gone to a shop and attempted to sexually assault her. Hearing her screams, passers-by rescued her and nabbed the boy.

The boy was handed over to the All Women’s Police Station in Krishnagiri and was later produced before the judicial magistrate’s court here.

The boy, who was to have appear for English II paper board exam on Tuesday, was remanded in juvenile home at Omalur in Salem.
title: Class 10 student held for sexual assault
